title: OVER 1800 SQ FT, 2 BEDROOMS, 2.5 BATHS AND A 2 CAR GARAGE ##
posting_body: Over 1800 Sq Ft, 2 Bedrooms, 2.5 Baths and A 2 Car Garage that Is finished!
Gourmet Kitchen, Lots of Cabinets and Counter Space, Wood Floor.
Master Bath with Garden Tub and Shower, Laundry Next to the Bedrooms, Large 2nd Bedroom with its Own Bath -
First Floor Study Can Be Used As 3rd Bedroom or Family Room.
Great Floor Plan, Great Location Convenient to the Metro Area.
